lead_paragraph: In sweeping the abridged two-game series, the Braves held the Mets to five hits as John Smoltz made a triumphant return from the disabled list by striking out six in five innings.
snippet: In sweeping the abridged two-game series, the Braves held the Mets to five hits as John Smoltz made a triumphant return from the disabled list by striking out six in five innings.
